location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident in the Persian Gulf, at Camp Moorghaub, to Lieutenant Thomas Beaty Davis, 1stLieutenant in charge of the HC Cruizer Antelope

mods.abstract: The letter concerns the indisposition of Lieutenant Augustus Hutley, and orders that the HC Cruizer Antelopeshould proceed to Bassidore [Bāsaʻīdū] to be placed under the orders of Captain Charles Sealy.
